kpi_info.title: RB SETUP ATTEMPT FOR DB-HSDPA
kpi_info.use: The number of attempted Radio Bearer setups/reconfigurations for DB-HSDPA. Includes initial DB-HSDPA allocations, reconfigurations from SC-HSDPA to DB-HSDPA, hard handovers and serving cell changes. M1006C209 is also updated along with this counter if the radio bearer was not using DC-HSDPA previously. UPDATED: When the RNC sends RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP, RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION, RRC: PHYSICAL CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION or RRC: TRANSPORT CHANNEL RECONFIGURATION to the UE with information to configure the radio bearer to use DB-HSDPA.
